column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday June 7 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: I-75N at the 97 MM / Traffic Alert:
column4: The roadway is shutdown until further notice due to a serious collision at the 102.6 MM.

column3: I-75N at the 97 MM / Traffic Alert:
column4: Traffic is reportedly being diverted to Exit 97.
